via_romana.midnightconfig.enable_surveyo: Colour all landmarks in the same network the same colour to indicate connections.
via_romana.midnightconfig.biomeColor.too:
Format: biome_path=map_colour
• biome_path: A valid Minecraft biome path (e.g., minecraft:plains).
• map_colour: Integer index for a map colour (0-61, check wiki).

Must reload for changes to take effect.
